events.message: I am filing a claim after my car was involved in a rear-end collision at the traffic light yesterday.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to evidence of vehicle damage and collision reports.
An agent specializing in auto insurance claims has been assigned to manage your case and provide further assistance.
Your claim has been acknowledged. Our team is now reviewing the details that you submitted for your vehicle accident.
Please submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and any repair estimates to proceed with your claim.
All requested documents including the police report, repair quotes, and photos have been uploaded successfully.
Our investigation team has started reviewing the submitted documents and contacting involved parties about the accident.
The investigation into the vehicle collision and related damage has been completed with all necessary checks executed.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damages found and repair cost estimates in your auto accident claim.
The customer responded to the settlement proposal with additional questions about coverage and repair timelines.
Your auto accident claim has been approved after review of all supporting evidence and settlement acceptance.
The payment for your approved car damage claim has been issued to the bank account you provided earlier.
Your auto accident claim case has now been closed following the successful payment and repairs to your vehicle.
The records of your auto accident claim have been archived for future reference or any follow-up inquiries.
